settings.title: Webhook.Manager Settings
settings.webhook_intro:
You have to register a webhook first. Copy and paste the Webhook URL, ID and Secret into the fields below. You can use the Webhook URL in your external scripts to trigger events on Homey!

Make sure that all your recipes that will trigger a flow on Homey have a json encoded body with the following properties: {"event":"your_event_name_here","data1":"data_field_1_here","data2":"data_field_2_here","data3":"data_field_3_here"}
data1, data2, and data3 are optional.
